did.head: Collection Overview
did.unittitle: Schlesinger-Rockefeller oral history project. {Publisher: Cambridge, Ma. : Schlesinger Library, Radcliffe College}
did.abstract: Five oral history transcripts of women in health services, maternal and childcare, family planning, marriage counseling, and sex education. Interviewees are: Mary Steichen Calderone, M.D.; Loraine Leeson Campbell; Florence Clothier, M.D.; Frances Hand Ferguson; and Adaline Pendleton Satterthwaite, M.D.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The Schlesinger-Rockefeller oral history project documents women in health services, maternal and childcare, family planning, marriage counseling, and sex education. Collection consists of five transcripts of oral history interviews conducted by James W. Reed, 1973-74. Interviewees are: Mary Steichen Calderone, M.D.; Loraine Leeson Campbell; Florence Clothier, M.D.; Frances Hand Ferguson; and Adaline Pendleton Satterthwaite, M.D.
NOTE: There is no container list for this collection. Contact the Sophia Smith Collection for more information.

accessrestrict.p: The papers are open to research according to the regulations of the Sophia Smith Collection.

userestrict.p: Transcript published by Arthur and Elizabeth Schlesinger Library on the History of Women (Radcliffe College, Cambridge, Mass., 1974). It is the responsibility of the researcher to identify and satisfy the holders of all copyrights.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Schlesinger-Rockefeller oral history project. {Publisher: Cambridge, Ma. : Schlesinger Library, Radcliffe College}, Sophia Smith Collection, Smith College, Northampton, Mass.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: The Adaline Pendleton Satterthwaite Papers are in the Sophia Smith Collection.
